section.title: Multi-Brand Compatibility
section.content: Easily manage and control various robot brands within one unified system.

section.title: IoT Integration
section.content: Control and monitor IoT-connected systems like door and elevator access, with real-time status updates.

section.title: Digital Twin Visualization
section.content: Access a real-time 3D model for immersive equipment monitoring and spatial awareness.

section.title: AI-Powered Insights
section.content: Advanced analytics for proactive maintenance, including lift noise inspection and ceiling water leak detection.
